search.start_searching: Such nach einzelnen Wörtern oder Sätzen, du kannst dabei auch Wildcards nutzen wie z.B. Ich liebe * ...

index.title: Datenbank Index
index.hint: By starting the indexing, linked will scan your days and add them to the search index. This is only necessary once after updating to v1.4.0.

allowPrerelease.title: Beta Test Program
allowPrerelease.hint: By enabling the checkbox, you will receive test builds of linked before their release.
